text: The New England Patriots are the White House today to meet with President Donald Trump who will honor them for their recent Super Bowl win. While wandering around the White House, the Patriots tight end stepped away from the group and crashed press secretary Sean Spicer ’ s daily briefing. “ Need some help? ” Gronk asked. “ I think I got this, but thank you … maybe. I ’ ll see you in a minute, ” Spicer said. As the press corp laughed, Spicer paused to take in the moment. “ All right, that was cool. How do you follow that? ”
